messages.subject: September blog carnival is up!!
messages.msgSnippet: Go check it out.... http://familyrun.ning.com/forum/topic/show?id=2184370%3ATopic%3A14210 Lots of entries again and some really interesting perspectives on the
messages.messageBody:
Go check it out....

http://familyrun.ning.com/forum/topic/show?id=2184370%3ATopic%3A14210

Lots of entries again and some really interesting perspectives on the
baggage of defining a person's learning within subject boundaries.

Anyone can join in!! You don't have to be a member of the Radical
Unschoolers Network. If you'd like to participate just read up on the
current topic and email me a link to any post you want to share.
Doesn't have to be a new post either.

Hope you'll join in the October topic all about unschoolers finding
their community and support networks.:)

Ren
